skillTree.localised_description: Each victory reinvigorates Khorne's champions to seek more bloodshed.

effects.description: Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after razing a settlement
Replenishes 30% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after razing a settlement

skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The larger the prey, the larger the guts to tear and bones to grind.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Most worthless of all are those who take false surety from cowardly sorceries.

effects.description: Attacks cause the "Dampened" effect, reducing Magic Resistance and removing Magical Attacks

Miscast base chance: +50% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: "YOU SHALL FACE ME!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: And in his shadow, the most favoured slaughter eightfold, their bodies girded in blood.

effects.description:
Barrier hit points: +500 for Khorne Daemon units
	(Lord's army)

Daemons Reforged: +15% chance for destroyed Daemons of Khorne units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Blows to shatter mountains, unbreakable form to weather the storm.
Death approaches on crimson wings, and cowardice only delays the inevitable.
When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
And so I travelled North, following the winds to the terrible gate between worlds.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +5 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: Tremble before me, mortals!

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Experience gain: +10% for units
	(own armies in region)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(own characters in region)

Experience gain: +20% for units
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers reward those who serve their interests.

skillTree.localised_description: Raw Chaos energy is deadlier than any poison.

skillTree.localised_description: With me at your back, nothing shall defeat us!

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +25

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

skillTree.localised_description: Still awash with the blood of the conquered, the most devoted servants of war deliver skulls afore the Blood God's Skull Throne.

skillTree.localised_description: A single moment is all it takes to become lost in a vicious maelstrom of wing, tooth and claw.

skillTree.localised_description: Where this Lord's rabid warriors appear, slaughter and Ruination are always sure to follow.

skillTree.localised_description: Leaving a trail of carnage and devastation in their wake, Khorne's Chosen are the most fervent acolytes of annihilation.

skillTree.localised_description: Many armies are lost almost instantly under an avalanche of uninhibited, murderous rage. Such things are wondrous to behold.

skillTree.localised_description: Into the heart of the enemy race the feral hounds of havoc and destruction.

skillTree.localised_description: The diabolic engines of war rumble with the endless wrath of the Blood God himself.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.localised_description: Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

skillTree.localised_description: This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

Daemons Reforged: +3% chance for destroyed Daemonic units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab or gouge, it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Prisoners? What need of them have we? No, kill them all. Do it now. Kharneth demands it."
If you don't kill them outright, to spill their blood and scar them for life is almost as good.
"My hammer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel. I grin while you writhe with the pain that I deal!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If there's trouble to be had – and by that I mean the worst kind of slaughter – this one will always be at the centre of things, instigating the conflict.
